name: crouch
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to bend your knees and lower yourself so that you are close to the ground and leaning forward slightly: She saw him coming and crouched (down) behind a bush.

a position in which you bend your knees and lower yourself so that you are close to the ground and leaning forward slightly: A loud noise would send him into a defensive crouch. She scrunched her tiny body into a low crouch.
More examplesFewer examplesHe dropped into a half crouch and spun back towards the door.She spun around, her body going automatically into a fighting crouch.She dropped her racket, collapsed into a crouch, and covered her face.
